definition: Yalu River, forming part of the China-Korea border

sentences.english: North Korean soldier stands guard beside the Yalu River near the North Korean town of Sinuiju.
sentences.chinese: 一名朝鮮軍人在朝鮮新義州附近的鴨綠江旁站崗。

sentences.english: Yalu River boat tours are the most popular means of gazing at North Korea—and North Koreans.
sentences.chinese: 船遊鴨綠江是遠觀朝鮮景色和朝鮮人最常用的方式。

sentences.english: Korea and China are separated by only the Yalu River.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮和中國只隔一條鴨綠江。

sentences.english: The 7th Infantry Division was to complete its advance to the Yalu.
sentences.chinese: 第7步兵師的任務是完成挺進鴨綠江的行動。

sentences.english: A steel railway bridge spans the Yalu River.
sentences.chinese: 鴨綠江上有一座鋼鐵大橋。

sentences.english: The Great Wall east to Shanhaiguan, West to Gansu and east to Jiayuguan, the Yalu River.
sentences.chinese: 長城東起山海關，西至甘肅嘉峪關，東至鴨綠江。

sentences.english: Hwanggumpyong is a sandy island at the mouth of the Yalu river that divides North Korea from China.
sentences.chinese: 黃古勇是個沙島位於分隔中國與北韓的鴨綠江口。

sentences.english: Then they moved toward the Yalu River, the border between North Korea and China.
sentences.chinese: 然後，他們鴨綠江，朝鮮和中國之間的邊界走向。

definition: Beilun district of Ningbo city 寧波市|宁波市[Ning2 bo1 shi4], Zhejiang

pinyin: Xi3 ma3 la1 ya3 shan1 mai4

definition: Lancang River of Qinghai and Yunnan, the upper reaches of Mekong River 湄公河[Mei2 gong1 He2] of Southeast Asia
the Grand Canal, 1800 km from Beijing to Hangzhou, built starting from 486 BC
Bashi Channel in the northern part of the Luzon Strait, just south of Taiwan
the Grand Canal, 1800 km from Beijing to Hangzhou, built starting from 486 BC
Kenting National Park on the Hengchun Peninsula 恆春半島|恒春半岛[Heng2 chun1 Ban4 dao3], Pingtung county, south Taiwan
pinyin: Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2

definition: Daxing'anling mountain range in northwest Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1] in northeast China/Daxing'anling prefecture
lit. single spear and horse (idiom); fig. single-handed/unaccompanied
Poyang Lake in Shangrao 上饒|上饶[Shang4 rao2], Jiangxi
